suggestedTasks.title: Add Unit Tests for Zombie Task Sweep Mechanism
suggestedTasks.description:
Create comprehensive unit tests to validate sweep_zombie_tasks() function behavior. Tests should cover scenarios like:
- Tasks with completely dead sessions
- Partially active sessions
- Edge cases in task state transitions
Tests should be added in the SQUAD CLI test suite to ensure robust error handling.
